String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Having no pain is a poor substitute for the warmth you obviously need.
String.Dest: 无病无痛可算作没办法吃饱穿暖的些微补偿。

String.Source: Such a kind, maudlin, and dare I say cloying little sweetheart. You'll make this wispmother cry a river of ectoplasm. Hopefully you'll drown in it.
String.Dest: 这样一个善良的爱哭的而且说句不中听的甜得发腻的小甜心。你会让这个幽魂之母哭出一条外质之河。 真希望你淹死在里面。

String.Source: What are you?
String.Dest: 你是什么？

String.Source: I am a wisp. Does that answer your question? No? Very well, I shall explain.
String.Dest: 我是个幽灵。这个答案你满意了吗？没有？很好，我会再解释的。

String.Source: What are you?
String.Dest: 你是什么？

String.Source: Essentially, at the core of my being, I am a ghost. Or rather, the imprint of a living soul.
String.Dest: 本质上讲，我实际上就是个幽灵。或者说是一个活灵魂的印记。

String.Source: What are you?
String.Dest: 你是什么？

String.Source: I possess the personality and knowledge of the one I represent, but nothing more.
String.Dest: 我只能呈现属于我的人格和知识，别的真没有。

String.Source: What are you?
String.Dest: 你是什么？

String.Source: Yet unlike a ghost, I am corporeal. I can touch the world around me, just as it can touch me.
String.Dest: 然而我和幽灵不一样，我是有形的。我能触摸到我周围的世界，正如它同样可以触摸我一样。

String.Source: What are you?
String.Dest: 你是什么？

String.Source: As for how I came to be, that is its own tale. One of regret, betrayal, but most of all, stupidity.
String.Dest: 要说我怎么会沦落到如此境地，那又是一个故事了——一个充满了悔恨、背叛，更多的是愚蠢的故事。

String.Source: What was this boy doing?
String.Dest: 这孩子当时在干什么？

String.Source: He was skipping rocks against the wall, mumbling in a language that was not the common tongue. Somehow I understood.
String.Dest: 他跳过岩石，冲向墙壁，嘟囔着什么奇怪的话，和普通的口音不一样。我能听懂一点点。

String.Source: What was this boy doing?
String.Dest: 这孩子当时在干什么？

String.Source: He asked me if I was his mother. When I told him no, he asked me if I wanted to be.
String.Dest: 他问我，我是不是他的母亲。当我摇头否定时，他又问我愿不愿意让他成为我的孩子。

String.Source: What was this boy doing?
String.Dest: 这孩子当时在干什么？

String.Source: And when I woke up the next morning, I was not cold anymore.
String.Dest: 我第二天早上起来时我再也不感觉冷了。

String.Source: How do you suppose you became a wispmother?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为自己会成为幽魂之母？

String.Source: I have no answer, only a theory. It was near the end of my life. I was starving, filthy, my lips about to drink from the burbling rivers of madness.
String.Dest: 我没有答案，只有个猜想。那是在我生命的最后关头。我很饿，很脏，嘴唇干得快要从【burbling rivers of madness】里喝水。

String.Source: How do you suppose you became a wispmother?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为自己会成为幽魂之母？

String.Source: I was cold...so cold. My clothes were wet, and the frost was flooding in through the pockets of loose stone.
String.Dest: 我很冷……非常冷。我的衣服是湿的,松动的石头里面涌出的水全都结成了霜。

String.Source: How do you suppose you became a wispmother?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为自己会成为幽魂之母？

String.Source: It was then I saw a boy. I can't be certain if he was even real.
String.Dest: 就在那时我看见一个男孩。我甚至不能肯定他是不是真实存在的。

String.Source: We could find out. Just tell me their names.
String.Dest: 我们会找出来的，只管告诉我他们的名字。

String.Source: (Laughs) Your lust for blood is amusing, mortal! I would very much like to help in nurturing such a very...desirable compulsion.
String.Dest: (笑声)你血液中的淫欲真有趣，凡人！我会很高兴去培育一种非常……令人满意的冲动。

String.Source: We could find out. Just tell me their names.
String.Dest: 我们会找出来的，只管告诉我他们的名字。

String.Source: Unfortunately, I have not waited countless millennia to have my vengeance handed to me on a dish not yet cold.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，我等待了无数个世纪不是为了一场随手可得﹑不畅快的复仇。

String.Source: That's enough about your past.
String.Dest: 关于你的过去，我已经了解够了。

String.Source: Finally.
String.Dest: 终于。

String.Source: It could be the child was a ghost, and made you its mother.
String.Dest: 这个小孩的鬼魂八成是错把你当成它母亲了。

String.Source: Possibly. There are many wisps and wispmothers who float about Skyrim with only the shades to call children.
String.Dest: 或许吧。有很多只在夜幕之下呼唤孩子的幽灵和幽魂之母飘荡在天际省。

String.Source: It could be the child was a ghost, and made you its mother.
String.Dest: 这个小孩的鬼魂八成是错把你当成它母亲了。

String.Source: Is the wisp's chime the sound of weeping for the lost? Or a melodic tune meant to attract a new child that she can steal away?
String.Dest: 这是小精灵的编钟因迷失而哭泣的声音？还是为了挽留一个偷偷离去孩子而响起的美妙的旋律？

String.Source: It could be the child was a ghost, and made you its mother.
String.Dest: 这个小孩的鬼魂八成是错把你当成它母亲了。

String.Source: I, however, have no desire to raise a litter of brats, and my song is meant only to frighten.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我都不想养一窝小崽子，我的歌只是为了把他们吓走。

String.Source: Ah, look! A mortal! I see you have discovered my lair. Very well done for a creature of such low wit.
String.Dest: 啊~一个凡人，我想你发现了我的巢穴，这对一个智力如此低下的生物来说的确是一件不容易的事。

String.Source: You were cold itself. When wisps move, it chimes like the wind on frozen teeth.
String.Dest: 你就是寒冷本身。当幽魂移动的时候，它发出的声响就像是寒风穿透了冰冷的牙齿。

String.Source: Perhaps the halfwit is right half the time. Becoming a wisp may be the fate of all wayward Snow Elves who know not of where our family rests.
String.Dest: 也许那傻子是对的。顽固的雪精灵最后的命运便是化为灰烬，谁知我的家人下场如何。

String.Source: You were cold itself. When wisps move, it chimes like the wind on frozen teeth.
String.Dest: 你就是寒冷本身。当幽魂移动的时候，它发出的声响就像是寒风穿透了冰冷的牙齿。

String.Source: Born of cold and to cold they return, but those who are lost can only sing to the wind.
String.Dest: 他们生于寒冷并回归寒冷，但这些迷失的人只能唱歌给风听。

String.Source: You were cold itself. When wisps move, it chimes like the wind on frozen teeth.
String.Dest: 你就是寒冷本身。当幽魂移动的时候，它发出的声响就像是寒风穿透了冰冷的牙齿。

String.Source: Is the chime of a wisp a beacon? Is its plangent bell a desperate cry, praying to the Gods for an answer?
String.Dest: 这小小的声响是某种信号吗？那哀婉的钟声是绝望的叫喊，还是为在为了答案而向众神发起的祷告？

String.Source: What about your mother?
String.Dest: 那你的母亲呢？

String.Source: What became of her I learned from the guards, who whispered stories from above. She fought for the Nords, they say, against her own kind.
String.Dest: 我在守卫低声讲述的故事那里了解到她变成了何人。他们说为了诺德人，她转身与自己的族人对抗。

String.Source: What about your mother?
String.Dest: 那你的母亲呢？

String.Source: She killed hundreds of her own people, watched the genocide of an entire race, all for the love of a man who would never make her his wife.
String.Dest: 她屠杀了成千上百个她的子民，还眼睁睁地看着整个种族被毁灭，只要是还懂得爱的男人就不会娶她为妻。

String.Source: What about your mother?
String.Dest: 那你的母亲呢？

String.Source: To put it simply, my mother had lost her mind.
String.Dest: 简单说，我妈她疯了。

String.Source: What about your mother?
String.Dest: 那你的母亲呢？

String.Source: They say in the end she was killed by the beasts of the wild, having ventured too far from camp.
String.Dest: 他们说，她最终被荒野里的野兽杀掉了。离营地太远真是非常冒险的行为。

String.Source: What about your mother?
String.Dest: 那你的母亲呢？

String.Source: (Scoffs) She was killed by beasts alright, but those that walk on two legs and smell of bad mead.
String.Dest: (嘲弄) 她确实是被畜生杀的，但却是死在那些用两条腿走路，浑身散发着恶臭蜜酒味儿的畜生手里。

String.Source: Low wit? Shows what you know. I'm completely witless.
String.Dest: 说我笨？你懂什么都说出来的吧，我真的笨得可怜。

String.Source: (Laughs) I stand corrected. Although perhaps you underestimate yourself. I would say one so sharp is at least deserving of the title "halfwit."
String.Dest: (笑) 我认错了。即使你可能低估了自己。我可以说这么一个骗子简直可以称得上是傻瓜的代名词啊。

String.Source: My mind is not filled with air. It is filled with ideas on how to kill you.
String.Dest: 我满脑子里装的不是空气，而是宰了你的方法。

String.Source: Then you are thousands of years too late. Which happens to be a very big number. Far more than a nitwit like you can count on your hands.
String.Dest: 你已经晚了几千年。这是一个非常大的数字，远远超过一个傻子能用自己的手指计算的极限。

String.Source: You call this cold? It's practically an oven.
String.Dest: 你管这叫冷？不过是个烤箱罢了。

String.Source: Some may call you brave, others will call you bold, but to my eyes you must be some sort of fowl, for your brain is filled with feathers.
String.Dest: 一些人说你很勇敢，还有些人说你是莽撞的，但在我眼里，你一定是某种鸟，因为你的脑袋里塞满了羽毛。

String.Source: You call this cold? It's practically an oven.
String.Dest: 你管这叫冷？不过是个烤箱罢了。

String.Source: Drench yourself in this sewer water, and spend a winter's night. Then do that for a thousand more and I will say your bravado is warranted.
String.Dest: 你要是能在冬天把自己泡在下水道的水里一整夜，然后重复做它1000多次，那我倒是信了你的故作勇敢。

String.Source: You call this cold? It's practically an oven.
String.Dest: 你管这叫冷？不过是个烤箱罢了。

String.Source: Not even a dragon whose blood is fire can call this place warm.
String.Dest: 即使是那些以火为血的龙也不能让这地方暖和起来。

String.Source: I'm sorry, you may have been someone before, but you're an abomination now.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，你以前可能是个好人，但你现在被人所憎恶。

String.Source: And yet you seek the forgiveness of the very abomination you seek to destroy! I have no need for your empty apologies, hero.
String.Dest: 然后你寻求那个你要毁掉的恶心东西的宽容！我不需要你那空洞的道歉，英雄。

String.Source: I'm sorry, you may have been someone before, but you're an abomination now.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，你以前可能是个好人，但你现在被人所憎恶。

String.Source: If you think me a monster, then slay me like a monster.
String.Dest: 要是你觉得我是个怪物，那就把我当作怪物一样杀了吧。

String.Source: I am a bright one. My mother told me so.
String.Dest: 我很机敏，我的母亲是那样告诉我的。

String.Source: And your wispmother says you are a dim candle with more wax in your ears than in your brain. And your wispmother isn't a liar like your real one.
String.Dest: 然后你的幽魂之母说，你是一支耳朵里的蜡油比脑子里还多的昏暗的蜡烛。你的幽魂之母还真不像你的亲妈一样撒谎。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: They are not even memories. Pictures maybe, of someone else. A young girl holding hands with a grown man.
String.Dest: 那些甚至不是回忆。可能是图片，或者其他东西。一个年轻的女孩握着一个成年人的手。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: He calls her his little mountain flower, and places one in her ear. They head on over to the market.
String.Dest: 他管她叫他的小山花儿，然后在她耳边别上了一朵。接着他俩去了集市。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: He shows her one of the fish at the monger's stall. A salmon as long as a mortal's arm and as fat as a housecat.
String.Dest: 他向她展示了货架上的一条胳膊一样长、大肥猫一样肥的大马哈鱼。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: He lifts her on his shoulders so she can touch it. It wiggles a bit and she squeals, drawing her hand back. The man smiles.
String.Dest: 他把她放在他的肩膀上这样她就能碰到它了。它摇晃了一下，于是她尖叫了起来，把手伸了回来。男人笑了。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: It was a conjuration trick. A touch of life. The man tells her she should be careful around the dead. For in Skyrim, the dead never die.
String.Dest: 这是个魔术戏法。 这是一种生活的经验。那个男人告诉她，她应该在死者周围变得更加小心。在天际省，死者永远不会彻底死去。

String.Source: Do you have any fond memories of your father?
String.Dest: 你有关于你父亲的美好回忆吗？

String.Source: Sage advice indeed.
String.Dest: 真心是高明之见.

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: When indeed, mortal. For even now I hardly consider myself dead.
String.Dest: 确实是这样，凡人。即使是现在我也几乎认为自己死了

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: In fact, I believe it is that very refusal to die that allowed me to continue wandering this plane.
String.Dest: 事实上，我相信是对死亡的拒绝让我得以继续漫游在这个平面上。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: Living in this squalid pit with only the rats to serve as meals, the only motivation I had was to outlive my father.
String.Dest: 在这种只能靠耗子充饥的破地方生存，支持我的唯一动机只有必须活得比我父亲久。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: I lived for the day when he lay on his deathbed, summoning me to his chamber in hopes that I would absolve him of his betrayal.
String.Dest: 我终于等到了这一天，他躺在病榻上，招呼我去他的房间，希望我能够原谅他的背叛。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: The dying always believe they can use their own deaths as a shortcut, a way to receive forgiveness from those they wronged in life.
String.Dest: 快死的人总以为可以把死亡当成一种捷径，以获得自己曾经伤害过的那些人的谅解。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: I vowed not to pity him when that moment came. I would spit in his face and let him greet Tsun with a glob of milky white hanging from his beard.
String.Dest: 在那一时刻到来时，我发誓不会再可怜他。我会往他脸上吐唾沫，让他去松加德见到孙时，胡子上还挂着的乳白的东西。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: Only he never gave me the satisfaction. They never brought me to see him. It would not have mattered. I could hear the whispers through the grate.
String.Dest: 只是他从未让我满意。他们从不带我去见他。这本来没什么的。我甚至能听见他们在壁炉后面的低声细语。

String.Source: When did you actually die?
String.Dest: 你到底是何时死的？

String.Source: My father had forgotten, and I was already dead.
String.Dest: 我父亲已经忘记了，然而我已经死了。

String.Source: Lair? Looks more like a dungeon to me.
String.Dest: 巢穴？在我看来更像个地牢。

String.Source: Peas for brains and onions for eyes, I dare say you are if nothing else a healthy dullard.
String.Dest: 豌豆对脑子好，洋葱对眼睛好，我敢说就算你啥都没有，你还是个健康的笨蛋。

String.Source: Lair? Looks more like a dungeon to me.
String.Dest: 巢穴？在我看来更像个地牢。

String.Source: Well pea-brain, consider the walls are not for keeping myself in, but for keeping fools out.
String.Dest: 好了傻瓜,这样想，那些墙是为了把笨蛋关在外面，而不是把我关在里面。

String.Source: Maybe you'll find peace. Learn to let go.
String.Dest: 或许你能平静下来。学会放手。

String.Source: You ask me to let go of the rope that sustains me, and trust the darkness below? No, I will clutch the rope tightly, and climb closer to the light.
String.Dest: 你要我放下支撑着我的绳子，把自己交托于下面的黑暗？不，我会抓紧绳子，向上爬去，向着光明爬去。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Now I will admit that when I first discovered the nature of my body, there was confusion.
String.Dest: 现在我要承认，当我第一次发现自己身体本质的时候，稍微有困惑。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: For so long I lived an existence full of lacking. I lacked food. I lacked warmth. In more ways than one.
String.Dest: 有很长一段时间我都活在贫乏之中。缺少食物，缺少温暖，可不光是字面上的意思。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: As a wisp, there was only one thing I lacked and it more than made up for the rest. What I lacked was pain.
String.Dest: 作为一个幽魂，我只缺少一样东西，但这样东西比其他所有的东西都要重要。我缺少的只有疼痛而已。

String.Source: What is it like, being a wispmother?
String.Dest: 作为幽魂之母的感觉是怎样的？

String.Source: I imagine it is much like your existence, only with thin wrappings for skin, glow dust for blood, and a skull completely filled with air.
String.Dest: 我想这很像你的存在，薄纸为肤，光尘为血，而头骨则完全暴露在空气之中。

String.Source: What is it like, being a wispmother?
String.Dest: 作为幽魂之母的感觉是怎样的？

String.Source: In other words, I am corporeal. Permanently so. I am not like a familiar or any other flimsy image cast upon this world by a frightened idiot.
String.Dest: 换句话说，我是有形有肉的。永远不变。我不是那些靠胆小鬼施法丢到世间来的召唤物之类的玩意。

String.Source: What is it like, being a wispmother?
String.Dest: 作为幽魂之母的感觉是怎样的？

String.Source: Now I will admit that when I first discovered the nature of my body, there was confusion.
String.Dest: 现在我要承认，当我第一次发现自己身体本质的时候，稍微有困惑。

String.Source: How did that complicate things?
String.Dest: 事情是怎么复杂化的？

String.Source: If my father was to lead the clan to prosperity, my existence could not be known.
String.Dest: 如果我的父亲才是领导族人走向繁荣的那个人，那我的存在就不会被世人所知了。

String.Source: How did that complicate things?
String.Dest: 事情是怎么复杂化的？

String.Source: So I was thrown into this dungeon, left here to rot through countless winters, through wars and famine.
String.Dest: 所以我就被扔进了这个地牢，被留在这里承受无尽的寒冬，承受战争和饥荒，然后在这里慢慢腐烂。

String.Source: How did that complicate things?
String.Dest: 事情是怎么复杂化的？

String.Source: I was here as castles crumbled and were built anew, haunting these damp, fetid tunnels as Olaf built Dragonsreach, and a new dungeon above it.
String.Dest: 在城堡被毁去重建时我就在这里，穴居在这些恶臭，潮湿的隧道里，而奥拉夫则在这上面筑起了龙临厅，修建了新的地牢。

String.Source: Who were you before you died?
String.Dest: 在你死掉之前你是谁？

String.Source: I was once the daughter of Hjor, one of the early patrons of the great clan Battle-Born.
String.Dest: 我曾经是Hjor的女儿，庞大的战狂家族早期的一员。

String.Source: Who were you before you died?
String.Dest: 在你死掉之前你是谁？

String.Source: It was the time of Nordic kings, long before Tiber Septim made this land the vanguard of his Empire.
String.Dest: 那是先古诺德君主的时代，比泰伯·赛普丁建立他的帝国还要早很多。

String.Source: Who were you before you died?
String.Dest: 在你死掉之前你是谁？

String.Source: Yet my father was only a father by blood, and not by name.
String.Dest: 但我的父亲只是血缘上的父亲，而不是名义上的。

String.Source: Who were you before you died?
String.Dest: 在你死掉之前你是谁？

String.Source: For my mother was one of the last of the Snow Elves, and their union was said to be a betrayal of both their people.
String.Dest: 我的母亲是最后幸存的雪精灵之一，然后他们的工会被说成是其中两人的背叛

String.Source: I've never met a wispmother who could talk.
String.Dest: 我还从没见过会说话的幽魂之母。

String.Source: Aren't you the bright one! You figured out I wasn't an ordinary wispmother, and you did so without the aid of pictures! Good for you!
String.Dest: 你真是个聪明人！一眼就能发现我不是个普通的幽魂之母，而且还没有靠图片的指引！真厉害！

String.Source: I've never met a wispmother who could talk.
String.Dest: 我还从没见过会说话的幽魂之母。

String.Source: I cannot say for certain why I am still lucid whereas others or not, only that I believe it has something to do with this location.
String.Dest: 我不能肯定的说出为什么众人皆醉我独醒，不过我相信这跟我身处的位置有关。

String.Source: I've never met a wispmother who could talk.
String.Dest: 我还从没见过会说话的幽魂之母。

String.Source: For all my life I wanted vengeance against those that wronged me, and it is that singular focus that brings thought to this once partial existence.
String.Dest: 我穷尽一生，只为向那些曾经待我不公的人复仇，这也就是我所在意的一切，它将思想注入了一个曾经残缺的灵魂。

String.Source: I've never met a wispmother who could talk.
String.Dest: 我还从没见过会说话的幽魂之母。

String.Source: Who is to say what would happen if the object of that enmity, the very descendents of the one I despise, were to leave Whiterun for another hold.
String.Dest: 如果我怀有敌意的那些人，我所鄙视那人的直系后代们，离开了白漫城去往他处的话，谁又能说清到底会发生些什么呢？

String.Source: I think your new body looks fantastic.
String.Dest: 我觉得你的新身体看起来棒极了！

String.Source: (Sigh) Kings and empires come and go, but the perverts will always remain.
String.Dest: (叹息) 国王们来来去去，可留下的只有变态。

String.Source: I think your new body looks fantastic.
String.Dest: 我觉得你的新身体看起来棒极了！

String.Source: Jealous of my figure, are you girl? Don't worry, we'll find you a mate. I think I saw skeever scuttle about just a second ago.
String.Dest: 嫉妒我的身材，是不是啊女孩？不用担心，我们会帮你找到情人的。我刚才就看到了一只吱吱叫的雪鼠。

String.Source: I think your new body looks fantastic.
String.Dest: 我觉得你的新身体看起来棒极了！

String.Source: It was very well off. It had its own rathole and a large chunk of moldy cheese. Let's hope for your sake it isn't too picky.
String.Dest: 它过得不错。它有自己的鼠洞和大块发霉芝士。 让我们祈祷它看在你的面子份上，不要那么挑剔吧。

String.Source: Better low of wit than bereft of body.
String.Dest: 低能可比失去身体要好。

String.Source: Well said. The dead may mock the living, but in the end all we really feel is envy.
String.Dest: 说得好，死人也许会嘲笑活着的，但最终让我们真正感觉到的却是嫉妒。

String.Source: We can't all be as smart and lovely as you.
String.Dest: 我们不可能像你这样又聪明又可爱。

String.Source: No I'm afraid you can't. Others may perhaps, but you are certainly not working with an adequate base.
String.Dest: 不，我恐怕你不行。别人可能可以，但你显然没有足够的基础。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Dragonborn, is it? And what might that be? Some sort of title? A name overweight Jarls bestow upon themselves to appear more menacing?
String.Dest: 龙裔,这是什么？可能是什么呢？某种头衔吗？在出现更多的威胁之时，名声显赫的领主们便会亲自授予这些头衔。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: I see no scales covering your body. You have no wings or fangs to speak of. What is it that you do, then? Do you breathe fire? Do you roar?
String.Dest: 你身上没长鳞片，也没有什么翅膀和爪子，那你能做些什么？能喷火？能咆哮？

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Do not make me laugh, human. You are as flimsy as a doll to me.
String.Dest: 不要耍宝了，凡人。你在我眼里和一个布偶一样弱。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Dragonborn, is it? And what might that be? Some sort of title? A name overweight Jarls bestow upon themselves to appear more menacing?
String.Dest: 龙裔,这是什么？可能是什么呢？某种头衔吗？在出现更多的威胁之时，名声显赫的领主们便会亲自授予这些头衔。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: You do have scales, though nowhere near as shiny as a dragon's. You have no wings, nor do you have fangs.
String.Dest: 你有鳞片，但远没有龙的耀眼。你没有翅膀，也没有獠牙。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: What is it that you do, then? Do you breathe fire? Do you roar? Do not make me laugh, lizard. You are as flimsy as a doll to me.
String.Dest: 然后你要做什么？要喷火吗？还是要开吼？别惹我发笑了，小蜥蜴。对我而言你就跟个洋娃娃似的那么脆弱。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Dragonborn, is it? And what might that be? Some sort of title? A name overweight Jarls bestow upon themselves to appear more menacing?
String.Dest: 龙裔,这是什么？可能是什么呢？某种头衔吗？在出现更多的威胁之时，名声显赫的领主们便会亲自授予这些头衔。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Now you are the right color, and you certainly are ugly enough to be a dragon. Yet you have neither scales nor wings.
String.Dest: 现在你是正确的颜色，而且你确实丑得足够当一条龙。尽管你还没有麟片跟翅膀。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: What is it that you do, then? Do you breathe fire? Do you roar? Do not make me laugh, Orsimer. You may be strong, but I far surpass you.
String.Dest: 那你到底会做些什么呢？你能喷火吗？你能丢龙吼吗？别丢逼了，兽人。你可能很屌，但我比你屌多了。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Dragonborn, is it? And what might that be? Some sort of title? A name overweight Jarls bestow upon themselves to appear more menacing?
String.Dest: 龙裔,这是什么？可能是什么呢？某种头衔吗？在出现更多的威胁之时，名声显赫的领主们便会亲自授予这些头衔。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: You are covered in fur, not scales. You have neither wings nor fangs. What is it that you do, then? Do you breathe fire?
String.Dest: 你身上的是毛皮不是鳞片。你又没有翅膀也没有尖牙。那你能干什么？会喷火吗？

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Do you roar like a dragon or a lion? I think you purr like a kitten. All the Skooma in Elsweyr could not make me a bigger fool than you.
String.Dest: 你觉得自己的咆哮像是条龙或一只狮子吗？我觉得你更像只小奶猫。就算我吃光了艾斯维尔所有的斯库玛，都不能变得比你更傻。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Dragonborn, is it? And what might that be? Some sort of title? A name overweight Jarls bestow upon themselves to appear more menacing?
String.Dest: 龙裔,这是什么？可能是什么呢？某种头衔吗？在出现更多的威胁之时，名声显赫的领主们便会亲自授予这些头衔。

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: I see no scales covering your body. You have neither wings nor fangs. What is it that you do, then? Do you breathe fire? Do you roar?
String.Dest: 我看你身上没有覆盖着鳞片。你也没翅膀也没獠牙。那你能做什么？会喷火吗？会嚎叫？

String.Source: As it so happens, I'm a Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 真巧, 我是一个龙裔。

String.Source: Do not make me laugh, Elf. You are as flimsy as a doll to me.
String.Dest: 不要逗我笑啊，伊芙。对我来说，你像布偶一般脆弱。

String.Source: The Battle-Born clan still lives today and is quite prosperous.
String.Dest: 战狂氏族依然健在，而且非常繁盛。

String.Source: So I've heard. There are no shortage of rumors that I am privy to in this foul sewer.
String.Dest: 我是这么听说的。这里可不缺我知晓污水道内幕的谣言。

String.Source: The Battle-Born clan still lives today and is quite prosperous.
String.Dest: 战狂氏族依然健在，而且非常繁盛。

String.Source: I wonder, as Olfrid plots the demise of the Gray-Manes, if he even knows his son is in love with one.
String.Dest: 我想知道，奥弗里德谋划了灰髯的死，他是不是有可能甚至知道自己的儿子们喜欢着一个灰髯家的人呢？

String.Source: The Battle-Born clan still lives today and is quite prosperous.
String.Dest: 战狂氏族依然健在，而且非常繁盛。

String.Source: I also hear they are Legion pets, loyal to an Empire led not by a Dragon King mind you, but High Elves.
String.Dest: 我还听说他们是军团的宠物，忠于帝国领导，不是因龙王而记住你,而是因为高精灵，

String.Source: The Battle-Born clan still lives today and is quite prosperous.
String.Dest: 战狂氏族依然健在，而且非常繁盛。

String.Source: What sweet irony. It brings me no shortage of joy to know my father's namesakes now defile his memory in this fashion.
String.Dest: 多么温柔的讽刺啊。

String.Source: Farewell now!
String.Dest: 再会吧!

String.Source: Goodbye little mortal!
String.Dest: 再见，卑微的人类。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。
